content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest command, I browsed the website https://www.euroace.net/ to find out what types of language courses Euroace offers. Previously, I had my computer browse the website https://www.goabroad.com/articles/language-study-abroad/best-language-schools-in-the-world and gather information on top language schools according to GoAbroad. The website listed Euroace in Spain, Maximo Nivel in Latin America, Greenheart Travel in France, EDUCA Language School in Russia, Qalam wa Lawh in Morocco, Hutong School in China, KCP International Japanese Language School in Japan, and Learn & Experience in the United Kingdom. The article emphasized the benefits of learning a second language and studying abroad in a country where the language is spoken. The website also provided information about the services and resources offered by GoAbroad.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Euroace offers group and private Spanish courses, online Spanish courses, and DELE preparation courses. They also offer specific Spanish courses, internships, gap year programs, custom study abroad programs, high school programs, and soccer programs. \n \n Links: ['\\n\\n   (https://euroace.net/)', 'Spanish Courses (https://euroace.net/spanish-courses/)', 'Group & Private Courses (https://euroace.net/spanish-courses/group-private-courses/)', 'Online Spanish Courses (https://euroace.net/spanish-courses/online-spanish-courses/)', 'DELE Preparation Courses (https://euroace.net/spanish-courses/dele-preparation-courses/)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://maximonivel.com/", "question": "What types of language courses does Maximo Nivel offer?"}}}'}]
"""
